Account Entity should create account with all fields

Account Entity isAsset should return true for asset accounts
Account Entity isLiability should return true for liability accounts

Account Entity currentBalance should return zero when both cachedBalance and balance are null
Account Entity currentBalance should handle negative balances

Account Entity utilizationRate should calculate correctly for credit cards

Account Entity isOverLimit should return true for credit cards over limit

Account Entity displayName should be just name when no institution
Account Entity formattedBalance should format correctly for assets
Account Entity formattedBalance should format correctly for liabilities
Account Entity formattedAvailableBalance should format correctly
Account Entity copyWith should create new instance with updated fields

Account Entity Balance Validation and Reconciliation isValidBalance should return true when cachedBalance and balance match
Account Entity Balance Validation and Reconciliation isValidBalance should handle null balances gracefully

AccountType Enum manualAccount should have correct properties
